summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test. It is crucial to investigate and resolve the issues causing the failure to ensure optimal user experience.
insights: The homepage, pricing page, and blog page have good loading times, indicating effective optimization and performance measures.
The "How It Works" page failed the test, suggesting potential issues such as large file sizes, unoptimized images, or slow server response times.
Investigating and addressing the issues on the "How It Works" page can significantly improve the overall web performance and user experience.
